price: 35 Je vais leur envoyer des présents et attendre la réponse que rapporteront nos émissaires. »
arabic: وَإِنِّي مُرۡسِلَةٌ إِلَيۡهِم بِهَدِيَّةٖ فَنَاظِرَةُۢ بِمَ يَرۡجِعُ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-innī mur'silatun ilayhim bihadiyyatin fanāẓiratun bima yarjiʿu al-mur'salūna
